Subjects: saints, hymns to; hymns, to saints; Winifred, saint
_description: A ‘himme’ to St Winifred, preceded and followed by prose prayers — seven quatrains (aaab)

RylandsLat165.First Lines:
Joy winefrede virine [sic] purethat ouercomminge youthful
                    lures…
RylandsLat165.Last Lines:
…and to þe ghost most holyboth now ee euer and
                    alwayes
RylandsLat165.Note: Add in a sixteenth-century hand on end flyleaves.
